A C D E G H I L P S T U

A

AbstractDatabase - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb
Abstract base classes for database objects providing an implentation of the load() operation that is used to load data into or execute scripts against the database.
AbstractDatabase(String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.AbstractDatabase
The constructor for this object stores the database name, user name and password that will be used to create connections.
AbstractInMemDBMojo - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb
Abstract base class for all the In Memory Database plug-in's Mojos.
AbstractInMemDBMojo() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.AbstractInMemDBMojo
The default constructor.
AbstractLoader - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr
Abstract base class for loaders that implements the Loader.isSupported() method.
AbstractLoader() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.ldr.AbstractLoader

Create and return a database object corresponding to type and initialise it with the database name, user name and password.

D

database - Variable in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.AbstractInMemDBMojo
The database name.
Database - Interface in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb
Describes the operations that are used by the Mojos to launch in-memory databases, load data into, execute scripts against or shutdown the database.
DatabaseFactory - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb
The factory that creates database objects.
DatabaseFactory() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.DatabaseFactory

Execute the Maven goal by creating a data source and then iterating over the list of sources and loading each one.
execute() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.StopInMemDBMojo
Execute the Maven goal to stop the in-memory database by sending it a shutdown command.
